important_announcements.title: Admission First Semester AY 2025 - 2026
important_announcements.description: Admission for the First Semester of Academic Year 2025 - 2026 is now open.

important_announcements.title: 2025 Graduation Ceremony
important_announcements.description: The 2025 Graduation Ceremony will be held at the CVSU Gymnasium. Graduates are required to attend the rehearsal on January 31, 2025.

important_announcements.title: Final Exams
important_announcements.description: Don't forget to study before the big day!

important_announcements.title: Scholarship Applications Open
important_announcements.description: Submit your application via the scholarship office website.

important_announcements.title: Updated Academic Policies for 2025
important_announcements.description: The university has updated its academic policies, including new attendance requirements and grading system changes. Visit the Registrar's Office or check the university website for full details.

important_announcements.title: University Job Fair 2025
important_announcements.description: Meet top employers and explore career opportunities! Open to juniors, seniors, and alumni. Don’t forget to bring your updated resume.

important_announcements.title: Digital Bulletin Board Launch!
important_announcements.description: 01/20/2025 is the official launch of our website!

upcoming_deadlines_events.title: Carmona Local History Exhibit
upcoming_deadlines_events.description:
Location: CVSU Library

Explore Carmona's rich heritage through a curated exhibit of photos, artifacts, and stories. Free and open to the public.

upcoming_deadlines_events.title: Public Lecture: Climate Action in Cavite
upcoming_deadlines_events.description:
Location: Municipal Hall, Carmona

Join us for a discussion on the impact of climate change in Cavite and the local government's initiatives to address it.

upcoming_deadlines_events.title: Community Wellness Fair
upcoming_deadlines_events.description:
Location: CVSU Carmona Grounds
Free health screenings, wellness workshops, and fitness demos. Open to all members of the community

upcoming_deadlines_events.title: Clean-Up Drive
upcoming_deadlines_events.description: Join us in keeping our community clean. Volunteers will receive certificates and free lunch.

upcoming_deadlines_events.title: Valentine's Day Fair
upcoming_deadlines_events.description: Celebrate love and friendship with booths, games, and live music. Bring your friends and join the fun!

upcoming_deadlines_events.title: Opening of the New Research and Development Center
upcoming_deadlines_events.description: A state-of-the-art facility dedicated to fostering innovation and research across all disciplines. Attend the ribbon-cutting ceremony at 10 AM.

milestones.title: Academic Excellence
milestones.description: Recognized as a top-performing campus within the CvSU system for producing quality graduates in various fields of study. Achieved high passing rates in licensure exams, consistently surpassing national averages.

milestones.title: Infrastructure Development
milestones.description: Completed the construction of modern, eco-friendly academic buildings equipped with state-of-the-art laboratories and facilities. Established dedicated spaces for innovation, research, and technology development, enhancing student and faculty productivity.

milestones.title: Research and Innovation
milestones.description: Awarded multiple grants for community-oriented research projects addressing local and national issues.

milestones.title: Celebrating 1,000 Users on the Bulletin Board!
milestones.description: Thank you for being part of our journey! As a token of appreciation, all active users will receive an exclusive digital badge.

milestones.title: Digital Bulletin Board is 3 months old!
milestones.description: Thank you for being part of our journey!
